players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Oh no, Bob is dead! I was hoping to hear from him first. Let's all share our thoughts."
You: "Bob's death is unfortunate. With only 4 players and 1 mafioso, we need to be very careful with our vote today. I think we should all share our thoughts on who seems suspicious."
Diana: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out."

You: "Diana, that's a very bold claim! If you're the detective and investigated Charlie, then we should definitely vote Charlie out. But I want to hear what Charlie has to say in response to this accusation first."

Diana: "Alice, we have no time for Charlie's response. I'm the detective and I know he's mafia. If we don't vote him out today, he'll kill one of us tonight and win tomorrow. Trust me and vote Charlie now."
Charlie: "Diana, if you were really the detective, you'd want to hear my defense before voting. You're rushing because you're the actual mafia trying to mislead Alice."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
